bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Charles Spitzer was a gunsmith who lived with his family in New Market, VA.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists primarily of letters among members of the Charles Spitzer family of New Market, VA. Also included are two Sunday school certificates (1850, 51) and two tax receipts (1849, 52). Most letters deal with day to day matters including illness and birth and death of family members.
